name: Froi
culture_notes: Riveric Dialect with Coastal Tongue loanwords
diet heavy on smoked fish and pickled river herbs
funerary offerings cast into river; small tide-fairs mark seasons
constraints: ritual magic depends on scarce imported reagents
no resurrection or long-range mind magics permitted
navigational auguries aid but don't replace seamanship
notes: population unknown; functions as a small transshipment point on a river route
growth limited by reagent supply lines and seasonal river behavior
